official_title: To require the President to call a White House Conference on Food and Nutrition.
short_title: White House Conference on Food and Nutrition
subjects: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

summary.text: The White House Conference on Food and Nutrition - Directs: (1) the President to call the White House Conference on Food and Nutrition to be convened in order to make fundamental policy recommendations on ways to end hunger and to improve nutrition in the United States; and (2) the Secretary of Health and Human Services, the Secretary of Agriculture, and the Secretary of the Treasury to plan and conduct the Conference. Sets forth Conference provisions.

titles.title: White House Conference on Food and Nutrition
To require the President to call a White House Conference on Food and Nutrition.
